channel.title: Is it possible to play a song in DOS?
channel.description:
What I'm trying to do is to get DOS to play a .mp3 file without opening a seperate program and without opening new windows or echoing text etc... I just want music to play with the person hearing it to have no control over it. Does anyone know how to do it? Specifically its for the game I'm making in DOS (I know its stupid, but its actually fun). Help is greatly appreciated and yes, I googled it and nothing came up. Thanks-
RXVL

item.title: Is it possible to play a song in DOS?
item.dc:creator: @Red_Phat Red Phat
item.description:
@Red_Phat wrote:

[quote=“lawl, post:1, topic:192410”][quote author=Red Phat link=topic=143031.msg2131282#msg2131282 date=1206328937]
It’s possible. I know that. What you need to be able to do is to somehow implement a DLL that plays mp3s into DOS. An easier solution is use this line of batch:

"C:\Program Files\Windows Media Player\wmplayer.exe" "C:/poo.mp3" /minimized

And when your done with the program, use this:

taskkill /im "C:\Program Files\Windows Media Player\wmplayer.exe"

[/quote]
DOS, not windows.[/quote]

Then you’ll need the rundll32 command. Dunno much about it, google it and see what you get.

Read full topic
item.source: Is it possible to play a song in DOS?

@Red_Phat wrote:

It’s possible. I know that. What you need to be able to do is to somehow implement a DLL that plays mp3s into DOS. An easier solution is use this line of batch:

"C:\Program Files\Windows Media Player\wmplayer.exe" "C:/poo.mp3" /minimized

And when your done with the program, use this:

taskkill /im "C:\Program Files\Windows Media Player\wmplayer.exe"

item.title: Is it possible to play a song in DOS?
item.dc:creator: @kloplop321 kloplop321
item.description:
@kloplop321 wrote:

I think games like that had a simple sound sampler and just played a midi-like sequence. He is asking for playing an mp3. Wav files is what I would suggest you start out with or convert to a Vox file.

Read full topic

item.source: Is it possible to play a song in DOS?

item.title: Is it possible to play a song in DOS?
item.dc:creator: @kloplop321 kloplop321
item.description:
@kloplop321 wrote:

it is possible. However, you just have to code your own codec in machine code, or figure out how to include one, and then have memory management, because you don’t want cached parts of the song hogging up the memory(this is just what I think, I do know it is possible though)

Read full topic
